title: The Echinoderms (TEFC): starfish, brittle stars, sea urchins, sea cucumbers
brief_description: Looks at the tide pool animals the echinoderms which share their evolutionary limbs with our own phylum. The segments introduce sea stars, brittle stars, basket stars, sea urchins, sand dollars and sea cucumbers.
